DEMO_503_MSG_010:
̃My goodness... is that you, Anses? I'm so relieved to see that you're back! I've been waiting for quite some time...
ā
DEMO_503_MSG_020:
̃Honestly, I'd begun to worry. That took a lot longer than usual. Did you run into some trouble along the way this time?
ā
DEMO_503_MSG_100:
̃Hmm, this is troubling... did you hit your head along the
way perhaps, and lose your memory? You look awfully confused.
ā
DEMO_503_MSG_030:
̃While I'm thinking of it, did you bump into Lucia along
the way? She did run off looking for you, after all...
DEMO_503_MSG_110:
̃Hmm... surely, that could help... perhaps you'd do best 
to pay a visit to your old pal, Birdie.
ā
DEMO_503_MSG_040:
̃N-N-No! Can this really be true!? She sacrificed her own life to try and take out that vile villain, Dark Master...
ā
DEMO_503_MSG_120: ̃With the amount you two have been through together, surely that would immediately retrigger your lost memories.
DEMO_503_MSG_050: ̃She was s-s-somebody we... she is irreplacable! We absolutely have to defeat Mother for Lucia's sake...
DEMO_503_MSG_130: ̃Head on over to that house over there, the one with the paper lanterns hanging out front. It belongs to Birdie.
DEMO_503_MSG_060:
̃It's very important now that you don't do anything rash.
Especially since you can try as many times as you wish.
ā
DEMO_503_MSG_070:
̃After all, you truly are Anses, The Immortal. One of
these times you'll surely be able to defeat Mother.
DEMO_503_MSG_080:
̃Hmm!? Why do we keep referring to you as Anses?
Perhaps this is a new brand of humor I don't understand...
ā
DEMO_503_MSG_090:
̃You are Anses! You look exactly like Anses!
And yet, do you still wish to deny this fact... ?
